profile.title: My profile
profile.paragraph1: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Minhaj, a developer passionate about code, but also about concrete and ambitious projects.
profile.paragraph2: I love continuous learning, taking on technical challenges and seeing an idea come to life through development.
profile.paragraph3: Beyond code, I'm interested in entrepreneurship (apps, real estate, financial independence) and I like projects that have a real impact. I'm also passionate about sports and self-improvement: progressing a little more each day is my philosophy, both in the gym and behind my keyboard.
profile.paragraph4: ðŸ’¡ What drives me: Transforming an idea into a real solution. Building my life goals step by step. Growing as a developer, but also as a person. Today, I'm looking for projects or a team where I can contribute with my energy, curiosity and determination.
